content.detailedDescription: On november 6, 2012 at 12 pm central time : i was at the entrance of my subdivision at the stop light waiting to turn left (west)on fm 518 on my way to take my daughter to preschool.  as i looked up at the stop light, i was in awe to what i saw..A very large metallic cylinder ufo hovering over the church across the street..The light turned green and i had to turn left...As i was turning left, i was looking up at it and was trying to pay attention to my driving at the same time.  i was in shock of what i was seeing. i had chills and it frightened me a bit. till this day i get goosebumps when i talk about it. i can feel my heart beat pounding in my chest. i have never seen any aircraft that looked like that. i wanted to pull over on to the median to take a picture. but traffic was a little bit heavy and i had to take my daughter to her afternoon pre-k class. when i pulled into the school parking lot it was hard to see the area where i saw it because of the trees blocking the view.  the day was sunny and slightly cloudy. during this whole incident it seemed like time was at a stand still. i did not hear the traffic or the object.  i just felt like i was in a dream. it happened so fast,it really did leave a foot print on my mind.  after, i dropped my daughter off i came home and immediately looked it up on line. my husband was home and i was out of breath as if i was running. he looked at me like i was crazy after i told him about the incident. he told me it is most likely a military craft out of ellington afb and that they were doing flight testing. i thought maybe it was a drone. but i searched for one online as well and all the drones have antennas or wings. what i saw that day was a long shiny metallic cylinder craft, had one black door or window in the middle of it. no wings, no lights flashing, no chem trails and no sound. ever since that day, i keep looking up into the sky hoping i would see it again.
content.summary: Saw a cylinder ufo hovering over the church across the street from the stop light

content.detailedDescription: I can't explain it but,i has this sudden urge to go outside to look up into the nighttime sky, when out out nowhere these two triangle shaped crafts zoomed by me in such a fast rate of speed with no sound what so ever. that's when i started really watching them because,i was certain that they weren't any type of airplanes that i've ever seen in my life! it was the craziest thing i've ever witnessed. it first looked like the one behind was chasing the one in the lead but then something even crazier happened. the one that was very close behind caught up to the one in front and it looked like they crashed into each other right in front of me.It was crazy and rather scary for me to watch. then out if nowhere these crafts some how connected and the disconnected continuing to follow very close to each other in a line formation while going at a very speed.I've never seen anything like this ever! i knew it wasn't an airplane as i also spotted one in the sky as these two crafts were flying.I observed what looked like to be a reddish color fast blinking lights on all three sides at these triangle ships. i watched them zoom through through the nighttime sky and seen other lights that looked like stars blink off as unsurpassed it then turned back on as if they were signaling one another. i stated to notice that it was a pattern with these things as they zoomed through  the sky. and the lights we simply think that are just stars started to do odd things as if it had a purpose.  the weirdest thoughts of an obsession take over started to race through my mind and i can't help not to wonder what the heck is really going on up in our sky while we live our life's never really looking up and studying our sky's. it's time that all of us start waking up and searching for the truth!It's out there and its our duty as humans to find it!Don't believe everything they tell us because,their truth is tinged with lies. be wise be aware something is out there hiding in plan sight right in front of our eyes!
content.summary: I seen two triangle shaped crafts zooming through the sky as if the one behind it was following the other one. i seen them what looked like a crash but they were extremely close ,right on top if eacher.Then the were right beside one another.

content.detailedDescription:
Sunday, june 1,2014::
 i work in a restaurant, and had just gotten home from work. typical day.  i was tired and went straight to bed at about 11:00-11:30 pm.  i was in a deep dream state, and can recall my dream for the most part, which is largely unusual for me.

i was awoken around 1:00 am june 2 by a series of 3 loud knocks coming from somewhere close by, inside the house.  the knocks were loud enough that i woke up with quite a start, and sat straight upright in bed. wide awake, my eyes were open and the walls were moving in a wavy sort of way.  i noticed the window sills bending and twisting.  i was a bit wierded out, but figured my eyes were adjusting to having just come directly out of a very vivid dream state.  i looked up at my ceiling fan and it was fading in and out of darkness, like what one might see when you are about to faint when you stand up too fast. also i notice my hearing is super super keen.  i can hear the refrigerator humming in the kitchen and other sounds that i think are the house settling. there is slight banging and knocking sounds and its almost as if i can tell from exactly what direction each noise is coming from in the house, i imagine its like how a bat must hear. i am also feeling like i am not alone in the house, like something is there. my small hairs are standing on end at this point. 

 i'm sitting upright in bed still, my eyes not focusing and feeling like i'm having an acid flashback of some sort, fear is setting in, and after a couple of minutes sitting there, my eyes still aren't adjusting. i cover one eye with one hand, hoping i will help focus them and do the same with the other eye, nothing changes.  i look out the north east window, and see 2 bright stars, swirling and dancing with each other and realize that my vision is quite messed up, i am freaked out and decide i need air.  so i get out of bed, iphone in hand (because i'm more frightened than i have ever been in my life and i might need to call someone) and walk to the west facing windows, which look out over a valley that the village of jackson is in. 

as i am looking out the window,thinking of opening it, i notice the stars in the sky are all perfectly in focus, no swimming or blurring, just perfect wide sky- the two white lights to the northeast that i saw while i was still in my bed- they are still 'dancing' with one another. then an orange, steady light comes into view from the south west, about as high as a regular plane would fly, but orange- non blinking.  it travels relatively slowly across the sky- stops for about 15 seconds- starts moving again at its original speed in a different direction- stops again- starts moving after a short 5 second pause, then proceeds to fly out of sight beyond the treeline by my house.

 as i am watching the orange light move across the sky, i text a friend who lives up the street @ 1:11 am:: "look out your window ufos in jackson sky!"

 why i didn't film it- i don't know- i was super scared and remember considering doing it, but had the distinct feeling that it might piss someone off or wouldn't be the right thing to do.

i am more scared than ever in my life at this point and decide i need to go out and be with other people. so i turn to head to the garage and hear sounds in my house.  i am freaked and realize i cant run from this, that going outside might not be a good idea either, so i close my bedroom door, look in the closet for whatever is in the house, and climb into bed- turn on my relaxing music to drown out the sounds in the house, pull the covers over my head and bury myself in pillows and fall asleep.

i wake up same as always 4:30 am, feeling calm and rested. i remember everything clear as a bell.  i walk thru the sun lit house, checking all the doors and closets to make sure no one is in the house. i go about my day, pondering the night before, my rational mind going over everything, making excuses about what i heard and saw.  by the end of the day, i have everything rationalized, explained logically, except the 3 knocks.  so i google it '3 knocks at night' and the first website that pops up,of course, has an alien on the homepage~~~> creepy shivers! 

 i take a shower before work, look for any strange marks on my body- none.
thats the end of the story i hope.  i don't remember seeing any other worldly beings, i was not hurt in any way- just terrified.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 2 white dancing lights in ne, the 1 steady orange light from sw>ne

content.detailedDescription: It came at night 4 years ago night time walking down my drive way late should be in bead but not ??? all i can say i was half asleep look to left could not move my head much lights where about 100 ft  away in ring that was on end reach the end of my drive way could see my naberhood no lights where on now the ring of lights where over my nabers house about 500ft up then fear like wow see small dark movements all so there was some thing in my butt like a boung then up on the m.T. top they make me work  they take the shovel a way make go to the underground room take some thing from them that it no more
content.summary: Lights thats were in a ring about 30 ft  40 ft that moved left to right

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: On the evening of the event i was taking the highway entrance ramp from state route 322 westbound onto interstate 271 south (mayfield heights, ohio)when i was watching for traffic merging onto to interstate and i noticed the objects. they can best be described as appearing like "chinese lanterns" with rotating white, yellow and red lights. at first i saw about 4 of the objects in a row rising into the sky moving west bound across the highway from where i was. they were fairly large maybe 50+ feet across about 1/4 - 1/2 mi. away and were rising into a low cloud deck that was about 1500 ft. high. i was so startled seeing the objects i pulled over to the side of the interstate to get a better view. when i looked northbound and toward a eastern direction up i 271 i saw about 13 - 15 objects all moving in the same direction. the objects looked "like pearls on a string" since they were rising fairly slowly and steadily into the low cloud deck. i stood watching the objects until they all ascended into the cloud deck. there was no sound emitting from the objects. i tried to take a picture on my smart phone but it didn't come out because it was dark and they were too far away. i can say the objects were not like anything i had ever seen before. originally i thought they could be balloons or a procession of aircraft but i ruled them both out. the objects were too large for balloons and were omitting the lights and all moving in a linear formation. they couldn't be aircraft since i didn't see any wings or heard any engine noise and they were moving slowly. i can also rule out helicopters, drones, hot air balloons ect. this was truly a unique experience for me and one that i will never forget.
content.summary: Rotating objects appeared like pearls on a necklace.

content.detailedDescription: Went into back garden and saw a white orb traveling silently over back of the house .. grabbed my sony handycam sr170 and began filming for nearly 4 minutes..
content.summary: White orb silently over back of my house from west to east direction

content.detailedDescription: Looking into the north east sky traveling east, airliners on approach to lax in the sky's lined up. a object lit with orange and yellow lighting heading north in the sky towards an airliner on approach heading south west at the same altitude. i almost crashed watching what i thought was going to be a mid air collision. just as it almost collided, the craft dove and circled under the airliner then continued north for 10 to 15 seconds then completely disappeared in a flash. both my daughter and i witnessed this. we are aviation enthusiasts this craft was no airplane or helicopter. there were no red, green or white lights.
content.summary: Near miss with airliner on approch to lax. dove and circled around the plane, then continued north then vanished. very clear night

content.detailedDescription: I was waiting for my kid after school and witnessed the object j st hovering amongst the clouds.
content.summary: Object hovering among clouds

content.detailedDescription: I believe it was end of may as it wasn't that cold that night.We left from visiting a mutual friend of ours and as we were walking back home, we crested a small hill that faces north to the intersection of sumas mt. road and dawson road. as we crested this hill i noticed a object out of the corner of my eye and look to the west i see this object a soft yellow and moving towards us. we stood the for about 2 mins as it slowly moved towards us arguing as to what it might be. ruled out a plane as object was moving to slow to sustain flight, and was to quite to be a helicopter as we could not here nothing all well it keeps coming closer. now keep in mind on sumas mt. at night if a neighbor dropped a tire iron the whole mt top would here it. this hill before the four corners is like a knoll you could see back then clearly to the west ,north and clearly to the east. the vessel stopped right in front of brian and i ( we froze) i could hear my heart pounding in my chest, the vessel hoovered for around 3 mins (imo). then it start to leave slowly at first then it went into like warp drive you see as it rose up the eastern mt side it maintained it level of plane. it seemed like it used the side of the mt as a launch ramp. it was egg shaped but with a substantially flattened bottom no visible ports or windows no sound not a wisp no visible exhaust! also it was the size of a small house 30 to 50 ft in diameter.A amazing and incredible experience.We lost sight as it hyperdrived into the night starlit sky. it actually left a steak of light then went bink like a star turn off.
content.summary: My friend and i were walking home from visiting another friend and witnessed this vessel?

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were in the garage and we heard the sound of jets overhead.  their path was directly over the cabin and so i wanted to share the photos with my brother-in-law (who owns the cabin) due to his interest in military machines. 
i have a samsung galaxy s5 because the photos are pretty darn good. it also has a feature which ticks me off sometimes because when the sound button is pressed it fires pictures in rapid succession. this happened yesterday but at the time i would have been happy with a couple of pictures of the fighter jets (truthfully not being an expert in military machines i am not all that sure they were fighter jets) they were flying low maybe two hundred feet off the ground as well very fast. their altitude remained low even with the object going at them.  i took a series of 11 photos(but your website could only let me upload 10).
i believe the fighter jets were headed to ellsworth air force base which i understand no longer is an operational military facility.
at the time i took the photos i had no idea there would be an object flying near the jets. it was not until i looked at the photos in the evening that i had captured something that was not us military.
the photos are just photos and open to interpretation, that is why i send them to your organization to analyze.
thank you for your time.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I was trying to get a photo of two fighter jets unaware that object would appear in the photo.

content.detailedDescription:
Silver capsule shape,looked to be smaller than a bus, just stayed over the trees for seconds, and disappeared while i was watching it.  no noise.
i was driving when i first saw it.  i stopped to look at it.  i saw the same object three times in february within a two week period.  all three sightings were in approximately a 1 square mile area. it did not ascend or descend,  it just disappeared.  it was shinny like a piece of aluminum foil and had no windows, doors...Just solid and shinny.
content.summary: Very shinny silver capsule shaped smaller than a school bus that disappeared while i was looking at it.  say it three times in february

content.detailedDescription:
While i was setting on my back porch deck at around 10:00pm waiting on my dogs to do their business before bed time, i was looking up in the eastern sky.  there was one relatively small normal looking white cloud.  suddenly what appeared to be a shooting star leaving a trail came straight down from the sky at about 45 degrees in the sky above the cloud.  it left a trail and the object changed colors from yellowish red to purple, then blue and as it was inside the cloud it slowed to a stop and changed to green.  then suddenly went out as sparks came out of it.  at that time it was about 20 degrees from the horizon.  i have seen these type of objects many times in the past as a child and in my adult life.  however, this time, when i went back inside my house to go to bed, i noticed it was 2:00am.  

what happened to the 4 hours, i do not remember?  i seems strange, as i felt like i did something, but i do not know or remember about what it was.  perhaps i was incorrect in the time, but pretty sure it was 10:00pm because of a television program had ended, then i went outside.  i have never experienced a missing time in all of my other sighting experiences.
content.summary: Observed a color changing object as it left a trail fall from the sky and then slowed to a stop and dissapeared

content.detailedDescription: Glanced out my south bedroom window about 9:45 pm and noticed brighter than normal, slightly low lights. we live near an airport so we see the airplane lights all the time. these struck me so i got up to look. i was shocked to see the typical triangle, dark form with 3 white lights on the corners, red flashing in the middle of the bottom. first thing i thought was look for the colored lights on the end of a planes wings. there were no colors or blinking except for the center red light. i just watched it thinking 'i can't believe i'm really seeing this'. i do believe the triangle is government something, but still. it was moving from east to west. when it was out of view at that window, i went out front to watch. there was a hum/rumbling noise fairly loud, but it was fairly low compared to planes that we see in the area. still moving west but now seen from the back. the back 2 white lights that i could see from this angle were steady lit but flashing brighter in unison. i was wishing i hadn't already turned my phone of and could have gotten a picture. i watched a few minutes as it carried on steady west, no fast or random movements, just above treetop level (from my view point) as it got further away. total time was several minutes.
content.summary: Triangle with white lights at corners, red light bottom center

content.detailedDescription: At 12:01 i noticed a bright light redish and orange bright bright, objecy was slowly moving inland heading west, object stopped,hovered, then got 3x brighter then when first seen, object shined brighter for 30 seconds before fading out ,after fading out the object shot out back towards the ocean heading west. no noise no trails was not a private or commercia plane, no flashing lights just the one bright light coming from the object that lit up the few clouds that were in the sky.
content.summary: Bright redish orange fireball that was heding east,stopped, got 3xbrighter,shined bright before light faded then shot back towards the ocean west. no noise no flashing lights required by the faa.

content.detailedDescription:
Once again one of the dogs had been barking wildly as well as growling off and on for about 30-40 minutes. due to the increase in sightings here above our property i have become fearful to go outside now so i simply stood in the front door, with it only partially cracked, to observe the dog. again the dog was pointed in the same wooded area of the property as it tends to turn when she (the dog) gets excited in this fashion. i waited for sometime, but did not observe anything in the sky, but i did observe that things were eerily quiet. suddenly a very brightly lit object appeared approaching very slowly from the northwest. the object never dimmed, blinked, or changed speeds in anyway. the object appeared to be about 15-20ft. in front of my house at an elevation of between 150-200ft traveling due east. the object emitted no sound. i noticed that once the object appeared in a lightened state my dog cease to bark or growl. i was able to capture many pictures over the course of almost 3 minutes. i am growing somewhat apprehensive as i am certain that these objects are continuously targeting me. is anyone ever going to help?


***i am currently doubtful that anyone is taking my reports with seriousness, so this will most likely be the last submitted.
content.summary: Very brightly lit object slowly passed almost directly over my house.

content.detailedDescription: Objects came out from behind cloud on the right and moved across the sky changing there positions.  the total time the object was visible (1min 25 sec) before they disappeared into another cloud on the left and i did not see them any more.  i could tell the objects were not geese since i did not see any flapping wings or long necks.  there bodies were just like any normal plane, but they did not move like a plane.  they were much faster and could move with ease into the various patterns. i do not know if there was an air show and if these were some sort of a team of professional fliers that perform like the blue angles or thunderbirds.  may be an actual sighting or just another miss identified object.  either way, they moved and made the directional changes with ease.
content.summary: Four objects changing positions while flying across northern sky

content.detailedDescription:
We lived on a dirt road and there were no bright lights near our house and i was driving back from dropping off a movie at a blockbuster sort of late at night and was almost ready to turn into my driveway when i noticed these red lights flashing in a moving triangular pattern. the object itself was stationary. i immediately stopped and watched not knowing what they could have been since i knew it couldn't have been a plane and didn't look like a helicopter.It was a little after ten p.M. at night and i just sat and watched these lights going around in a perfect triangle shape. i began to wonder how long this could go on since it was getting later and my husband knew i was just dropping off a movie. i sat outside in the truck for probably ten to fifteen minutes,then all at once the red lights all went to a single point of light and then just disappeared completely. i knew right then that what i had just witnessed was a ufo. telling my husband and friends i had to face kidding and ridicule , but i didn't care. the next day at work, i told people and they all said i was "having flashbacks" kiddingly, but i still knew what i had seen was true. later that night, my friend from work called me to say that she had just seen on the news that there were sightings in kissimmee area and reports of a farmer having chickens die from something unknown. i immediately felt vindicated since that was the area in the sky that i was looking towards, even though it was a long way from my house. i even went so far as to call lockheed martin security the night before, to see if anything strange had happened there but of course not. to this day i still believe in what i saw and still look to the night skies to see what i might be able to see. i realize that this is being sent to you years late but at the time i didn't know who to talk to since i wasn't believed by anyone and i myself had no pictures or proof, but it can at least be on record and maybe help 
cooberate someone else's report of that time. i believe in life out there and we should all be open to this.
content.summary: Hovered stationary for at least 10-15 minutes with red flashing lights that rotated in a triangular shape, then all lights went to one light, then totally disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Driving south on kramien rd at approximately 6:45am toward ladd hill rd on a clear, sunny morning, i noticed the disc hovering over the junction of kramien and ladd hill roads.  i drove to the junction and stopped directly under the disc and watched it for a few minutes. after occurring to me that this could be dangerous, as there were no other cars or people in the area, i turned onto ladd hill road and left the area.
content.summary: Observed dull metal disc in stationary pose above ladd hill rd on parrett mountain, east of newberg.

content.detailedDescription: Chehalem mountain lies north of newberg; parrett mountain lies east of newberg.  i was in my apartment in ne newberg, talking to my 16-yr old daughter who was housesitting on chehalem mountain. as we were talking, i watched a slow-moving white light advancing south toward me.  i had begun to wonder when i would see the flashing red and green wingtip lights as it seemed to be getting close enough when the light suddenly changed course by 90 degrees and zipped extremely fast toward parrett mountain.  when my daughter suddenly took a sudden intake of breath, i asked her if she had seen the same light and she responded that she had. i told her that she had probably just seen her first ufo.
content.summary: Observed slow-moving white light moving se toward me in newberg.

content.detailedDescription:
I live in a rural area. a few acres. walked my dog about 45 minutes after dusk april 28, 2014. i was walking under the power line that serves my home and the others in the area. not a big power line but for home use.  there was still considerable ambient light i noticed a bright light to the sw which i thought was venus but i quickly corrected myself as venus is a morning star this time of year. the light got brighter and larger.  it seemed to strobe. also it appeared that there was a leading edge like a flying wing that was obscured by a fog or mist. for a second or two i saw the edge appear on the left side (my view) then obscure again. as the craft came close it morphed. crazy i know but the bright wight light changed into a solid triangle structure. it flew directly over me along the power line no more than 500 to 800feet above me. the triangle portion of the craft had a purple or violet light similar to neon outlining the triangles edge. there was a softer violet color on the middle of the craft and at the very center a bright white light. no sound what so ever. it moved from horizon to horizon in approximately 90 seconds.  it was a large structure. i would say the triangle was 100 feet by 100 feet by 100 feet but the object was larger as it was shrouded in some sort of mist. another curious thing. no emissions at all. no sound at all. it seem to be pulled along rather than being pushed like our know propulsion works.  it was steady no wavering in speed or direction. 

i have seen and reported other sightings before. not with mufon but another site. those reports were of lights doing erratic movements at incredible speeds stop start increase in size and then disappear in less than a second. there are 7 or those sightings. this is the first solid structure i have observed.

the object kept moving until it disappeared to the northeast horizon again no more than 90 seconds before it was beyond view.  unfortunately i was charging my cell phone and did not get a photo.  it seemed that the object wanted me to see it.  from what i could determine it could have obscured my view using the mist or fog or whatever it used to make it  so it's true size could not be determined. this thing was huge.  

i wish i had a photo.
content.summary: Viewed bright light just appeared on horizon from sw seemed to strobe changed to purple triangle moved directly overhead.

content.detailedDescription:
On a warm, clear summer night, i was called by neighbor to bring my husband's hunting rifle with new leopold & stevens scope to pasture area between our houses.  the neighbor pointed out the ball shape on horizon of parrett mountain, seemingly drifting very slowly. when viewed through the rifle scope, the craft appeared to be like a glowing, crystal golfball, including patterned indentations. particularly curious were the 8 - 10 shiny flat discs that moved independently around the golfball craft in various directions but never far.  my neighbor and i watched the group move slowly toward the se for about 30 - 45 minutes before leaving that spot. 

that neighbor passed away several years ago.
content.summary: Observed golfball-shaped craft, crystal surface with glowing interior light.

content.detailedDescription:
I was a young girl about 12 yrs old playing outside my house with my cousin. we were play fighting over a chair. it suddenly started to vibrate we stepped away to notice a ufo before us. it was in between the mobile home trailers about 10 ft off the ground. i witnessed 3 aliens inside, i always said 2 adults and a child. i saw they had black super computers with lots of buttons. the smaller alien waved, and a beem came down from the bottom of the craft and we ran inside screaming. the next morning there was a burnt perfect circle on the road where the ufo was hovering, there was no sound. i don't recall how long after but the streets were paved over. i used to make drawing of what i saw. it was a dark silver disk, clear large window across, it had bulbs which flashed red, blue, green, yellow, white. very few not even a hand full know of my sighting, up until maybe 3 yrs ago i feared so much ufos i could not see or talk about them. i also recall one night in my room at the home where this happened i was asleep and was awaken to the sounds of what i thought was an airplane outside my window, there was a bright light shinning in my room and i remember seeing something standing at the foot of my bed and i passed out. i've always had a sharp sting on my right foot and always thought they place something there but i don't know. 

what i saw, i saw it was real and i lived with the fear for soo many years. i wish someone could explain what happened.
content.summary: I witnessed 3 aliens inside the ufo about 20ft from me, they had super computers inside.

content.detailedDescription: I was bbqing and looking south towards the moon. i then saw what looked like football shaped object rotating as it went towards the west. it had a golden reflective surface on one side and dark on the other as it rotated. one point was angled up pointing sw the othe pointing downwards towards the east. it was moving at a steady pace.
content.summary: Football shaped craft rotating counterclockwise. shining golden then dark as it rotated.

content.detailedDescription: I pretty much covered it in short description but again im working on the edge of town in midland texas ind i looked up and just above the roofline about 1000 feet away i saw what looked like a plane, but it looked brighter than most during the day so it caught my eye and after a few seconds it took off faster then i could really register, it looked like it turned into a shooting star! i mentioned it on facebook and a friend said he saw the exact same thing in california around the same time? and also a little later saw similar looking thing in the same direction but that one just disappeared instead of shooting off, and i habe also seen a similar silver dot almost looks like like a far away plane but not about 15 years ago that also just vanished thats kinda why i recognised it when i saw it and watched it! anyway hopefully this helps somehow and goodluck and goodwork👽👽👽
content.summary: I saw an airplane like object that was moving similarly but caught my eye, looked brighter for daytime and after a few seconds it flew like a shooting star! im in texas and a friend saw the same thing in california, and one later that faded not shot off.

content.detailedDescription: I was a motocross event at the amateur track at unadilla motocross facility on may 11 2014 ( mothersday). my stepson was waiting to return to our pit area because he had a chain failure on the bike during his moto. as a result,i returned to our trailer in the pits before he got a tow back.As i was walking back toward our trailer,i noticed this object on the western horizon moving very slow from the south to the north.When i reached our trailer,i continued to watch this thing for i believe maybe 3 to 4 minutes.And, i also remember thinking,"doesn't anyone else see this?" but,despite that,i neglected to even point it out to my friend just across the road.This is where my story gets strange,as if what i'm describing isn't strange to begin with.Despite the fact that i believe in the ufo pheom.,i'm not nutty about it.Thing is, i don't remember stopping watching it.I'm convinced i would have watched it until it disappeared out of sight.I'm convinced that i would have brought it to someones attention immediately.I'm convinced that i would have been extremely excited about it and told my stepson or anyone for that matter.Reguardless,i didn't.Fact is,i didn't tell anyone about it all day until about 9:00 that night when my wife and i were in the hot tub and i remembered and said to my wife,"holy cow babe you wont believe what i saw today."this thing was as long or longer than the body of an airliner but without wings.It was moving very slow.Slower than a blimp.I have seen several blimps at major league sporting events,and this thing didn't fly anything like a blimp.It was whiteish but didn't appear to be very clear in my focus at all.I made no sound.I recall it being approx. 1000' in the air if that.Seeing this object doesn't bother me,but,not recalling the incident until later in the evening does.
content.summary: Long cigar shaped object with no clear markings,traveling very slow with no sound from south to north.

content.detailedDescription: While descending corral creek road from the higher altitude of parrett mountain late one evening, my daughter and i observed a row of six to eight windows floating beyond trees, below our twisty descent.  when we reached an open area and observed the craft moving over our car, we exited the car to look up but the craft had disappeared. it was very dark and no visible shape could be determined.  all that we really could determine was the row of windows.
content.summary: Observed row of lit, square windows moving beyond the trees below our position.

content.detailedDescription: I had taken my dog outside to go to the bathroom while i was out there i decided to do the same i was staring up at the stars from my back deck which faces south, as i looked up i noticed three lights streaking towards me on the horizon as fast as i could tilt my head to follow them were as  fast as they were going i actually lost sight right before they passed directly over my house i abruptly ran through the house to the other side i was able to find them again. they had flown clear to the other horizon.   they then appeared to slow and made a 90 degree course correction and headed due east. the altitude they appear to be flying at was extremely high, rate of speed was also extremely high. i  have never observed any type of craft with these type of capabilities. i have no idea what the craft could have been when i first noticed it it was moving faster than anything i've ever seen. i felt kind of in awe because i've never witnessed anything moving that fast.  i lost visual of  the object after it past behind trees far to the north of my position.
content.summary: It was heading north from south. it flew directly over my position and over my house i went to the other side of the house of served the pattern of lights low and then make a 90-degree turn to the east at the other horizon.

content.detailedDescription: My name is [name removed/cms/tg] & my son's name is [name removed/cms/tg].You are asking all the wrong questions,my son & i,along with my jack russel dog can go back in the woods,at the end of my street,at anytime,at dusk & see this,as i was told from my computer,(live energy),that starts out as a visable static,grey in color,& then as we stair at it,a weird face like thing forms.My dog & i have seen this,for over three years,now!I did not want to tell anybody because they would think i was crazy.But i finally told my 43 year old son & we went back to see it.I was so happy when it appeared to him,also.I don't like my sons,or anybody to doubt,this 69 year old man.We could go back & see it right now,if we wanted to.There is high tension wires,running right by there.I have lived here since 1969 & i never told anybody,before,except my sons.  thank you, [name removed/cms/tg]   [phone number removed/cms/tg]   [email removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: An energy that changed shap,when we stair at it??

content.detailedDescription: Diriving north on gill rd. at about 9:15 pm june 5th between seven and eight mile rd. observed people looking up in the sky.  i looked up about 45 degrees to the south west and saw this object just sitting in the sky, not moving. it was large and dark and almost like the side of a can. a fighter jet was directly overhead as i  could see the contrail. but, the jet was much higher. another jet was off to the north. felt surprise as it was big based on the height of it, but seemed suspended in air. i'm sure others saw it as wellas they were staring up at it. i took my eyes off of it, drove home and lost it a block away.Erhaps a small helicopter?
content.summary: Black object hovering in sky in livonia michigan. fighter jet also directly overhead, but much higher. observed by three people walking on gill rd. i stopped to look and saw it as well. looked large and high but just hung in the air.

content.detailedDescription: On vacation, at 3am it was very warm & i couldn't sleep so, i decided to take a rubber lifeboat from the 36ft. houseboat, we rented and row out into the middle of lake meade. i got about 1/3 the distance to mid lake (3 mi. across from shore to shore)when i saw an orange glow beneath the water 200 yards ahead of me. an orange sphere ascended from beneath to a height of apprx. 60 ft., and traveled west towards the parking lot (3 miles away). after a couple minutes it changed course directly headed in my direction. at first i thought it had mearly stopped, but as it got larger, it became obvious it was heading in my direction. as it got closer i could see it was apprx. 60 ft. in diameter, and 60 ft. above the water, which reflected the orange glow it was emmiting. eventually it traversed directly over my head, though without slowing at all, continued on a course directly towards the houseboat from whence i came. the houseboat was tied to the rock formation at the entrance of a sandstone canyon approx. 1/3 mile into the 1500 ft. mountains on the north side of lake meade. that is when i could confirm the altitude of the sphere, as it floated over the houseboat, and on into the canyon. it lit up the sandstones escarpments of the canyon very well as it moved. when it reached the end of the canyon it ascended up, and over the top of the mountains where it remained out of sight (except for the glowing orange hue radiating the maountain skyline. after several minutes it ascended into sight, then darted straight up, and dissapeared into space. it never exceeded a speed of approx. 6 knots from the first sighting until it departed. i have to admit, i was terrified when it floated directly over my head. it was completely silent. i really don't know if it saw me, or not. no one back at the house boat was awake to observe what happened. i know hat i saw, but i can only guess what it was. it was definitely under the control of something, and i kind of believe it came from area 51, located a few miles from lake meade. it just appeared to be some kind of "test" of an incredibly advanced technology acquired by this government. that's my take on the incident. there are much better places for the extraterrestrials to hide, or conduct experiments than "lake meade"! however it (is) a very convenient location for performing black ops investigations on captured technology. i'm 66 y.O. and have no reason to make something like this up. hell, it took me this long just to tell anyone but my closest friends. i could have been a little more detailed but, this pretty well covers the facts of the profoundly incredible incident.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Appeared to ascend from water 300 yards away& float over me then ascend over the mountains then up into space.
